entry.title: [WW] Anyone have a recommendation for an online (remote) personal trainer? I.e., some
entry.content:
Anyone have a recommendation for an online (remote) personal trainer? I.e., someone who makes a diet and workout routine for you and checks in once a month or so to update it. In particular, I'm looking for one that's very metrics-/goal-oriented, which is why I thought this sub might be a good place to ask.
(I'm a guy looking to gain muscle rather than lose weight. I know that there are free online workout plans I can follow instead that are just as good but spending money to overcome procrastination & motivation issues is a good tradeoff for me here.)
